metadata.name: One Month of Flux #1
metadata.description:
Legendary director Peter Bogdanovich narrates and directs Academy Award-winning actress Kim Basinger in this groundbreaking dynamic NFT powered by Transient Labs. View in the NFT marketplace of your choice to watch this short film respond in real time to the movement of LIT in the time frame noted in the title of your piece.

[View Fullscreen](https://litwtf.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmTfPL6QZ3YrE6y7eFGHiZEQazzJLWmS7SPwqZwxEwvMZR/one_month_lit.html)
